M	deps/v8/src/objects.cc
f94b85d Revert part of 11727 as it sometimes tanked V8 benchmark (raytrace) performance for reasons that are not obvious. Now we make objects into fast-case objects when they are made prototypes for other objects, but we do not mark objects that are already fast case with a bit that helps keep them in fast case. Review URL: https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/10556004
